trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction in which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control is displayed relative to its parent control.
Uses the mouse position to specify that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is displayed above and to the left of its parent control.
Uses the mouse position to specify that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is displayed above and to the right of its parent control.
Uses the mouse position to specify that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is displayed below and to the left of its parent control.
Uses the mouse position to specify that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is displayed below and to the right of its parent control.

Compensates for nested drop-down controls and responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> setting, specifying either <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection.Left"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection.Right"></xref> accordingly.
Compensates for nested drop-down controls and specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is displayed to the left of its parent control.
Compensates for nested drop-down controls and specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is displayed to the right of its parent control.
